contenido: Disaster vocabulary Current events Personally significant events Socially significant events.

Stories about real and imaginary or fictional characters and events.
Typical highfrequency fictional characters: witch, wizard, vampire, fairy, warrior, alien, lord, warlord, evil, enchanted.
